Reviews.Title: Great energy saver!
Reviews.Author: Susan L-B
Reviews.Content: This TV is run on a 200 watt DC solar system along with several other LED products, a car stereo system and an occasional AC/inverter electronic device. It is an upgrade from an 18.5" LED DC TV. The system continues to perform superbly with judicious use of power. This TV is fabulous. It has a great picture and it's obvious low energy use is remarkable.

Reviews.Title: Really happy so far
Reviews.Author: Alexander Estevez
Reviews.Content: Just unboxed and tested the TV and so far I am really happy with the performance.  I was skeptical at first of buying an offbrand TV but the options for 12 volt TVs are very limited.  You can't beat the price and the picture is outstanding.  So far I've only used it for about 30 minutes.  I use it in my camper using the 12 volt cigarette lighter socket connector that is included with the TV.  Will provide an update if anything changes.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Sparky San Diego
Reviews.Content: Needed a new tv for the motor home. After looking at various models settled on this one. Glad I did. The picture is one of the best. Our home tv is a high priced 55" LED and this one has as good if not better of a picture. The sound quality could be better but for a small tv in a confined area (motor home) it works fine.Hooked a blu ray up to the tv and WOW!!! The picture quality is awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: good tv for camper
Reviews.Author: LSU fan
Reviews.Content: was leary of buying not a familiar brand; but we hooked it up & had no problems; was very pleased with it

Reviews.Title: Light weight, vivid picture.
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: The Supersonic SC2411 is a great, portable, versatile TV. I was originally looking for a 24 inch computer monitor and realized I could get this TV with HDMI input and have additional inputs including HDTV (ATSC) over the air and sound for the same price as other manufacturers are charging for just a 24 inch monitor with only HDMI input and no sound.The sound is very comparable to that of most portable TVs I've owned in the past. Perfectly acceptable for the news and other programs with primarily speech content. For movies and other theatrical type uses, I plan to connect directly to audio outputs of the video source (Patriot Box Office, XBox etc.). The manual for this TV claims there is a digital coax audio output to connect to amplifier or other audio decoding device but I don't have the equipment to confirm this.

Reviews.Title: Great for FPV (First Person View)
Reviews.Author: Eddie James
Reviews.Content: This Monitor works great for FPV flying - goes to static (no blue screen) with instant recovery. It is also very light and I can set up my ground station with it in less than 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: 24" Supersonic AC/DC TV
Reviews.Author: S. Dancer
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our new camper.  Not a whole lot of options out there for this size AC/DC, this TV has a wonderful picture and is thin to mount on the wall.  Great TV all around!

Reviews.Title: 12 Volt TV with NO 12 Volt adapter?
Reviews.Author: Cory Young
Reviews.Content: A 12 volt TV with no 12 volt adapter? Why sell a 12 volt Tv with no way to power it? I unboxed the TV and was ready to install and watch movies with the family on the boat, only to find there was no way to power it off my batteries. The entire reason for purchasing a 12 volt TV is to NOT run the inverter. The power cord is an additional 25 dollars with shipping, it should be included but is not.. The sound is also VERY below par.

Reviews.Title: Great value, good performance.
Reviews.Author: J. Lowe "JL"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for occasional use in our motorhome.  I use the 12VDC outlet and it draws less than 4 amps.  Primarily used with an 18" Directv satellite dish and the picture at standard def is good.  Have also used over the air digital antenna and the resolution is at least 720P.  Works well with DVD player and Iphone using an Iphone-HDMI adapter.  Lots of connections in back. Sound is acceptable, but works great when plugged into motorhome stereo system.  The coax connector is in an odd position and tightening the cable is a bit of a challenge.  Recommend using a 90deg coax elbow for ease of use.  Overall, good value.

Reviews.Title: After 3 months STOP Working. Warranty 3 months only
Reviews.Author: Rene
Reviews.Content: After 3 months, the TV just stop working. I call the Supersonic phone number, and they told me the warranty is just for 3 Months, so it didn't cover the repair, so I paid 65 dollars. Don't buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixel
Reviews.Author: G. Long
Reviews.Content: I bought this July 16, 2013 and within 4 months is showing a dead pixel. At least this is what I think it to be. I only see it on a dark, black type of background. This has daily use at home.Mainly, this was for my small 15' trailer hooked to a Jensen multi-use-player 12v. I found the installation of getting the player to work with this TV no easy task. I came to understand component vs composite or one into the other is challenging. You can't just take the normal yellow, red and white and plug into Supersonics green, red & white inputs on the bottom, which was the only way I could get a picture. It must go into the yellow ports on the side of the TV, not the bottom and menu button called (source) changed to component. Unfortunately with Jensen still in the stone age offer no better inputs other than y,r,w. Jensens support just pointed the finger at Supersonic.The great side of this story is; Supersonics support help me fix the issues within a couple emails and right away. Also, Supersonic developed the TV so it could be used in a variety of ways supporting 12volts for campers for which I'm grateful.The downside, when connected to component the picture is OK but nothing like hdmi cables or blue-ray but the audio will come over the natural wired speakers of the stereo, dvd unit or whatever's in the RV. If you only get audio from the TV, you might be a bit disappointed, like others have noted, sounds like a transistor radio I had back in 1965, which was very cool at the time.Since I'm blind in one eye anyways, the dead pixel and (eye) are getting along with only slight hurt feelings. I'm just glad to have something for the camper. The issues above had many folks pretty upset on some RV forums without knowing the fix.

Reviews.Title: Does not receive ANY channels
Reviews.Author: gerardo v brinkman
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for the bedroom in my RV; I have NAXA TV in the living room. Using the EXACT same antenna and underthe EXACT same conditions - My NAXA tv receives 13 channels, the SuperSonic TV receives NONE. I moved to 3 different locationsand the NAXA always locks into > 10 channels - the Supersonic has yet to find any channels. I called Tech support at SuperSonicand they said I needed an amplfied antenna. The RV Does have an amplified antenna - still no luck with the SupeSonic. I'll be returning the TV and ordering another NAXA

Reviews.Title: sound stopped working after 2 mos.
Reviews.Author: Sandra "Sandra"
Reviews.Content: I liked this TV a lot initially. I used it in my apartment and it had great reception. Mounted it in my van. Picture still great (i see one pixel)but after using it infrequently after two months, i now have no sound whatsoever. went thru all the menus...just nothing. also the buttons on the top are a bit difficult to use. i lost the remote and you cannot get a replacement anywhere except the manufact/seller for $30. I will be looking for a new DC TV elsewhere...not sure if it can be repaired or what the cost would be.

Reviews.Title: The product was defective
Reviews.Author: California collector
Reviews.Content: This TV may be ok, but the one that I received did not work correctly.  The picture had horizontal noise on all inputs, so I returned it.  The seller was apologetic and promptly E-Mailed a return authorization.  My refund was also promptly processed.When shopping for a 12 volt TV for an RV, there aren't many choices, and they are often more expensive than a comparable 110 volt set.  I have found, however, that several of the smaller 110 volt flat screen sets actually have a DC input and use an outboard transformer to step down and rectify the voltage to 19 volts DC. 19 volts just happens to be the input voltage for laptop computers and there are 12 volt adapters for them.  I just purchased a 26 inch LG flat screen with DC input for $199 at a local electronics store, and the wattage is the same as my laptop, so with my laptop's adapter, I have an AC/DC set and the store didn't even realize it!

Reviews.Title: Does Not Include 12Volt Lighter Socket Power Cord
Reviews.Author: lifeisgood71
Reviews.Content: I was excited to receive my Supersonic SC-2411 12 Volt AC/DC Widescreen Full 1080p HD LED TV w/ ATSC Digital Tuner.  I bought this TV to replace my 120v 22" Magnavox LCD TV in my RV.  I wanted a TV that consumed less power and that I did not have to use a power adapter to go from DC to AC.Upon removing from the box I opened it to look at the contents.  Needless to say, I was disappointed to find that it did not come with a 12Volt Lighter Socket Power Cord.  However, it is corded for a 120V and comes with an AC/DC converter.  Not sure why it comes with AC/DC converter when it is already corded for 120V.  Anyhow, I ended up purchasing the 12Volt Lighter Socket Power Cord from http://www.12volt-travel.com/12volt-lighter-socket-power-cord-for-jensen-12volt-tvs-p-15098.html and now all is good.I will be boon docking this weekend so I will be able to better test the TV.  Just from what I have seen it looks good so far.

Reviews.Title: Just what we were looking for
Reviews.Author: First Time Mom
Reviews.Content: We bought a new camper without a tv and wanted a 12v tv for it.  Like others, was leery about buying an offbrand tv online but it seemed like a decent deal so we thought we'd try it.  It works perfectly in our camper and the picture and sound quality are good (hooked up easily and sound comes through camper speaker system).  Nice to be able to leave our generator at home when we go camping now since we really only used it for watching movies when it was raining.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Richard C Tolley
Reviews.Content: Fairly good image quality and color saturation. Purchased for an RV and I am (so far) satisfied with the device.

Reviews.Title: Supersonic TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Wagstaff
Reviews.Content: After owning it for a month or so, and for the price, I like it.  I use it in my bedroom at home and when we go camping in the travel trailer, it comes with us and at 8 lbs, it is nice and light.  The picture is good and sound is so-so.  I would recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Tardiff
Reviews.Content: Quite a nice picture. The sound as it come set though is tinny. Go to the "User" setting and adjust the treble all the way down and the bass all he way up to get a decent sound. I mounted this TV in my RV on an articulating arm. We'll see how the TV holds up to bumps and vibrations after a few trips. I spent only $225.00 with free shipping for this TV. Another semi well known brand cost well over $300.00 in the same size and the stand and 120/12 volt power supply are extra. This is all included in this Supersonic TV. SO far I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Dissapointed...
Reviews.Content: Great picture, and contrary to other reviews, I found the sound to be robust - albeit it does not thump my RV.  I would highly recommend this television if you're looking for a 12V television in your RV.

Reviews.Title: Included in search for DVD Combo
Reviews.Author: KTB
Reviews.Content: This item came up in a search for a DVD Combo.  It is NOT a dvd combo, 12 volt tv.Didn't keep product.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: cheryl
Reviews.Content: real happy with product wish it came in bigger size 29 or 32 would recomend, it was delived in a time that was promished

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy!
Reviews.Author: Carmen Smith
Reviews.Content: Great television.  Beautiful picture, slim and light.  Travels well in my bumpy camper :)  Got it much sooner than expected.

Reviews.Title: Good price, weak indoor antenna reception
Reviews.Author: PL
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have commented, this is an excellent value for a 12 volt compatible lcd-led television. However, if you plan on using this t.v. for over-the-air broadcasts and you are using only an indoor antenna, make sure you are within 25 miles or so of the station towers. It will not tune in much outside of this range even with the most advanced indoor antenna. I am comparing this tuner's performance to that of a lower-end 32" Samsung model, which tunes in 17 digital channels under the same circumstances. I cannot comment on the tuner performance using an outdoor antenna.

Reviews.Title: Great 12 volt TV
Reviews.Author: Ken Bajema "Antimatter"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for an RV with limited power. I am using the 12 volt option and don't see any quality degradation as oposed to using the 120 volt cord that it comes with.Sound is decentI have one dead pixel in the lower left hand corner of the screen that doesn't bother me and is not worth sending it back for. I've used the TV in my RV for about two months now without issues.I like the connection options on the back for head phones, Iphones, USB drives, laptop speakers and standard RGB.

Reviews.Title: This Supersonic is AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: dink
Reviews.Content: The item was delivered undamaged and on time.We used this while camping in some rough country in OR. Our DVD's played perfect, the picture was clear, audio was excellent. Even with all the dust it performed at top rate. It is the perfect size and is wall mounted.My husband had no problem installing it in our travel trailer.I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: riverrealtor
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price, we are using it for our guest bedroom and it is perfect.  We will also be using this for our travel trailer.

Reviews.Title: Liked, could have been better
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Moore
Reviews.Content: Unit works well. Mine didn't come with a 12 volt plug, as I was led to believe. I am in the process of making my own. So far, good picture on all the sources I have tried, off air and blue-ray fed by HDMI.

ProductInfo.Features:
24 Inch Supersonic 12 Volt AC/DC Widescreen Full 1080p HD LED TV w/ ATSC  Digital Tuner
Aspect Ratio: 16:9; Resolution: 1920 x 1080; Brightness: 250cd/m; Contrast Ratio: 1000:1; Response Time: 5ms; Viewing Angle: 170˚ (H), 160˚ (V)
12 Volt AC/DC Compatible
Consumption: 42W
Input Terminals Compatible: HDMI/VGA/RF/USB/PC Audio/CVBS/YPbPr
ProductInfo.Name: Supersonic Sc-2411 24" Widescreen LED Hdtv
